WRITING.TITLE: How do i make money off of my art
WRITING.TEXT: Fyi I'm under 18 and im not going to use any methods that require any purchases.
I don't have Twitter, is there some way I could enter from Reddit?
I want to help but I'm still a noon to pixel art
I'm an all around noon to art, but I can tell you that you need to use more colors for the shading- I try to do a gradient type thing when I do pixel art and art in general.

I've only made really bad games with scratch and using Java script coding(have to code all the images with draw functions in Java script) but G.I.M.P. is an AMAZING program- I use it all of the time for pixel art and I use it to make GIFs, you just need to know what you're doing and how to navigate the program. Best part is IT'S 100% FREE! And if you need something that's not built in to the program, it has a built in script editor, so people are constantly making addons for it. If you need help with it, I can help you. Its quite easy but hard to find a tutorial on, but once I figured it out, I was so good at using the program I even taught the class clown/ idiot (my friend in my computer class with a teacher who doesn't even know what a keyboard shortcut is- no joke) how to make full fledged pixel GIFs with the program.
Its a dude who put his entire house in a super oversized backpack

I starve myself a lot just because i feel like a burden to those who love me- but i find it difficult to do so because they try and take care of me and try to make me eat. On top of that i have a psychiatrist appointment monthly and he always records my weight bc i was under weight untill not too long ago but in the past maybe two weeks I've lost a lot of weight and now im probably under weight again. This was totally worthless info but that's my two cents (more like one cent its so worthless)

This reminds me of when i was younger, i found this gate in my utility easement(basically a dirt ally with your water and gas meter) that was in the ground like some sort of fence was there, but there wasn't anything around it. I would spend hours playing around it- pretending like it was a magical door like in The Lion the Witch and the Wardrobe, or some kind of infinite loop that brought you back to were you started when you go through it

Your writing is amazing and very little by this point can probably stop you, but if your still alive and reading this i want you to know that. It may not be the best choice, commiting suicide, but it sure as heck would be mine if i were you. Im so sorry you had to go through so much pain. I know pain, and i wish no one ever had to feel it, I'd even take all of the pain in the world to help others stop feeling it.

If you're still alive and reading this, i want you to know you are an amazing writer. This was so well written and i am so so sorry you had to go through so much pain. I hope it's better for you on the other side. It hurts me so much that you or anyone else has to feel such pain, i know what it's like to hurt and i wish no one ever had to again. I would even take everyone's pain for myself if i could, just so that i might be able to fix this terrible world. Blessings and i will remember you when i pray, so hopefully you might make it to wherever it is your faith says you want to.

So i skimmed through your post (Sorry i couldn't concentrate enough to read the whole thing- i have ADHD) and i can understand how your feeling to Ann extent. I'm still a teen, growing up in the lower middle class (i think); i have autism, depression, ADHD, self diagnosed insomnia, and maybe even ocd. I've self harmed and been suicidal my whole life. I have (had) a grate family (sadly most of witch have died). I never had to starve, I've always has nice clothes and a roof over my head. I do well in school but i still feel suicidal. I guess im just kinda ranting because all i can say to help you Is that i think you need a psychiatrist. They can help you with prescription drugs. I'm no doctor but maybe you should try a lower dose of whatever you were on because you said you were unnaturally happy- just a guess. If you need to vent I'm usually a much better listener- it's just my medication hasn't kicked in yet. If you don't have a pet it could be really therapeutic to get one- if it weren't for my cat I'd probably be dead rn. Hope you get better and I'm here if you need to vent.

WRITING.TEXT: So i have a trashy LG-K3 android phone and I'm having problems with online games- it seems to be limited to live ones(CoC works just fine but this problem occurs with Among us and Clash Royal). The problem is that whenever i play a live online multiplayer game it always (and i mean *ALWAYS*) crashes at some random time after about 2-3 mins. have already passed. I also can't find and haven't gotten the chance to get an sd- so storage isn't easy to work with. On the other hand this problem doesn't have to do with storage because when I'm not in need of it i keep the play store uninstalled. I tried force stopping and updating the programs(they didn't need an update and Google play store was up to date). The problem also started occurring after i had only just booted up each game literally seconds after it finished installing. Hard and soft resetting my phone didn't work and no messing around with storage space or the play store did anything. On top of that my internet is never having problems when this happens. This is all that the internet was able to help me with to trouble shoot the problem, pls help. And *thank you* in advance #183;u #183;

I was the weird kid... I'll never forget the day i learned to fling paper clips. in middle school the whole school except the two basketball courts was indoors- one building cause it was a small school. I could flick a paper clip so hard the bang it made when it hit the back of my locker echoed through the whole hall way(a little longer than three class rooms long- i think class rooms are all about the same size). I also got in trouble a few times for flicking paper clips across the hall- there was a class room at the end of the hall and i could flick a paper clip to the point were it almost slid all the way to the back wall of it from the other end of the hall. I also got in trouble for flinging my rubber bracelets and fighting with them rather than paying attention(i didn't yet know i had ADHD). Took me years to learn i never fit in due to my autism. I was the class weirdo and literally no one but the really nice or the friendless/ other total outcasts wanted to be around me. I was also annoying af because i love anything annoying(like Nyan cat), making me immune, and i love annoying others. I was really weird

WRITING.TITLE: I'm wondering just how unhealthy/ possibly dangerous this is
WRITING.TEXT: I'm a young teen (prefer not to share my exact age) and i do a lot to self harm. Rn I'm just worried about my most recent problem- i started starving my self as self harm(although it never hurt because i made young me be able to go long periods without food- not as self harm). I've been starving myself allot lately and it's gotten to the point were a medium sized homemade quesadilla is enough to last me an entire day. My stomach is so small I literally never feel hungry and I think i might have some sort of mineral deficiency because it's not uncommon for me to go temporarily blind when i stand up. Is this gonna start causing me brain damage or cause some sort of long term/ permanent damage to my body?
Ok, just wondering- can it cause brain damage. I already have a therapist and a psychiatrist but i can't get myself to talk to them.

If by "blacking out" you mean pushing out I'm not, it's just that occasionally when i stand up I'll go blind for a few seconds and get a little dizzy. It takes me a moment to lose vision throughout all of my vision if i do. Its not risk blindness though, I'll see insanely bright fuzz throughout my vision.
So basically I'm inadvertently attempting suicide though
And why am i never hungry- am i just getting used to it. Also i always feel thirsty, dis that have to do with this

Ik it's not completely confidential- if i say I'm self harming or having suicidal thoughts confidentiality is terminated (but fam. found out recently anyways, i just can't bring myself to talk about it with anyone who has the ability to, or will, do anything about it). Edit: its also not me looking for control or anything, i just hate myself more than the poor kid sitting next to me in class does(unless it's my bff, no one wants to be near me in class). I wish to kms in the most painful way possible when I'm no longer needed here by my family so i can suffer for all I've done wrong. That's why i SH- to make myself suffer. When it's not to suffer its to take my hate out- my hate for myself and any hate for anything else. When I'm triggered SH is the only thing that makes me feel better (i read an article once that explained an experiment showing people who cut has less hormones that cause happiness [or whatever it was] in their spinal cord fluid tan people who didn't and that it released that hormone[or whatever] into. introvert bodies when they cut. I'll try to find the link if i can).
